title: Visual Learning Path for Beginners in Machine Learning
description: This personalized learning path is designed for beginners with no prior knowledge in machine learning who prefer visual learning styles. The path will introduce fundamental concepts in machine learning through visually engaging resources.
goals: Understand basic concepts of machine learning
Develop foundational skills in machine learning
Gain exposure to visual resources in machine learning

milestones.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
milestones.description: Overview of machine learning and its applications, basic terminologies, and types of machine learning algorithms.
skills_gained: Exposure to basic concepts through visuals

milestones.title: Supervised Learning
milestones.description: Focus on supervised learning, including regression and classification, with visual examples of algorithms.
skills_gained: Ability to differentiate between regression and classification

milestones.title: Unsupervised Learning
milestones.description: Exploration of unsupervised learning techniques such as clustering and dimensionality reduction with visual representations.
skills_gained: Ability to interpret clustering results visually

milestones.title: Neural Networks and Deep Learning
milestones.description: Introduction to neural networks, deep learning, and their visual representations.

prerequisites: Interest in data analysis and pattern recognition
